dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Aquarium keeping:  feeds on plants and roots; in groups of 5 or more individuals; minimum aquarium size 80 cm (Ref. 51539).

dataObjects.description: Spawns either during dusk or dawn. The male tends the clutch and helps freeing the fry from they eggs. (Ref. 1672)
